Description
Login
 

  • Uses of LoginService in Login

    Classes in Login that implement LoginService
    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    class 
    LoginOperation
    This class implements the LoginService interface and serves as the core of the login operation using the decorator pattern.
    class 
    LoginVerifier
    Abstract decorator class for login verification.
    class 
    PasswordVerifier
    Concrete decorator class that extends the login operation to verify the password.
    class 
    UsernameVerifier
    Concrete decorator class that extends the login operation to verify the username.

    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description

    LoginVerifier.wrappee
    The LoginService object that this verifier wraps.

    Constructor
    Description
     
    LoginVerifier(LoginService wrappee)
    Constructs a LoginVerifier that wraps another LoginService object.
     
    PasswordVerifier(LoginService wrappee, String filePath)
    Constructs a PasswordVerifier to wrap the login verification chain.
     
    UsernameVerifier(LoginService wrappee, String filePath)
    Constructs a UsernameVerifier to wrap the login verification chain.
